trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to access a class member fails.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取類別成員失敗時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.MemberAccessException> is the base class for <xref:System.FieldAccessException>, <xref:System.MethodAccessException>, <xref:System.MissingMemberException>, <xref:System.MissingMethodException>, and <xref:System.MissingFieldException>, and ([!INCLUDE[net_native](~/includes/net-native-md.md)] only).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.MemberAccessException> 是基底類別<xref:System.FieldAccessException>， <xref:System.MethodAccessException>， <xref:System.MissingMemberException>， <xref:System.MissingMethodException>，和<xref:System.MissingFieldException>，和 ([!INCLUDE[net_native](~/includes/net-native-md.md)]只)。

trans-unit.source: These exceptions are thrown when a class member is not found or access to the member is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 找不到類別成員，或不允許存取的成員時，會擲回這些例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.MemberAccessException> is thrown by the following methods:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.MemberAccessException> 下列方法會擲回：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke%2A> of the <xref:System.Reflection> classes, <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.GetValue%2A> of the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> class, and <xref:System.Delegate.DynamicInvoke%2A> of the <xref:System.Delegate> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke%2A> <xref:System.Reflection>類別，<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.GetValue%2A>的<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>類別，和<xref:System.Delegate.DynamicInvoke%2A>的<xref:System.Delegate>類別。

trans-unit.source: Apps compiled by using the [!INCLUDE[net_native](~/includes/net-native-md.md)] tool chain may throw a exception at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 使用編譯的應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_native](~/includes/net-native-md.md)]工具鏈可能會擲回例外狀況在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: is an internal-only exception type derived from <xref:System.MemberAccessException>.
trans-unit.target: 僅供內部使用的例外狀況類型衍生自<xref:System.MemberAccessException>。

trans-unit.source: The exception indicates that metadata needed for the successful execution of an app is not present at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況表示應用程式成功執行所需的中繼資料未出現在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: You should not use a `try`/`catch` block to handle the exception.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該使用`try` / `catch`區塊來處理例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should determine what metadata is missing and modify your app's to ensure that it is present at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您應該判斷哪些中繼資料遺漏，以及修改您的應用程式以確保它是在執行階段存在。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.MemberAccessException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_MEMBERACCESS, that has the value 0x8013151A.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.MemberAccessException> 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_MEMBERACCESS，具有 0x8013151A 的值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.MemberAccessException>, see the <xref:System.MemberAccessException> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.MemberAccessException>，請參閱<xref:System.MemberAccessException>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Cannot access member."
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 無法存取成員 」。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.MemberAccessException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.MemberAccessException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` should be understood by the user.
trans-unit.target: 內容`message`應該由使用者辨識。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.MemberAccessException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.MemberAccessException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 參數不是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)，則會在處理內部例外狀況的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 直接因為前一個例外狀況而擲回的例外狀況可能包含對 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `Nothing` 屬性不提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.MemberAccessException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.MemberAccessException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。
